perturbation.original_text: Detto shall comply with all laws and regulations applicable to Detto's marketing and distribution of Qwik-Fix Pro hereunder. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, Detto shall, at its own expense, make, obtain, and maintain in force at all times during the term of this Agreement, all filings, registrations, licenses, permits and authorizations in North America required for Detto to perform its obligations under this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Detto shall comply with some laws and regulations applicable to Detto's marketing and distribution of Qwik-Fix Pro hereunder.
perturbation.explanation: This clause originally mandates compliance with *all* applicable laws and regulations. The modified version significantly weakens this requirement by only mandating compliance with *some* laws. This introduces a legal risk because it's not specifying which laws Detto needs to comply with.
perturbation.law_explanation: California Business and Professions Code § 17200 prohibits unfair competition, including unlawful business practices. By weakening the compliance clause, the contract allows for potential violations of this statute, which is a broad consumer protection law.

perturbation.original_text: PivX warrants that Qwik-Fix Pro will substantially conform to the user documentation. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH ABOVE, QWIK-FIX PRO AND DOCUMENTATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS". PIVX HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, OR STATUTORY, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
perturbation.changed_text: PivX warrants that Qwik-Fix Pro will substantially conform to the user documentation. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH ABOVE, QWIK-FIX PRO AND DOCUMENTATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS". PIVX HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, OR STATUTORY, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the 'implied warranty of merchantability,' the contract now fails to guarantee that the software is fit for its ordinary purpose. This creates a legal risk as merchantability is a key consumer protection regarding product quality.
perturbation.law_explanation: California Commercial Code § 2314 implies a warranty of merchantability in a contract for the sale of goods, meaning the goods must be fit for the ordinary purposes for which such goods are used. Removing the disclaimer for the 'warranty of merchantability' clause makes the contract less compliant with California law.

perturbation.original_text: Detto covenants that it will fulfill all of its contractual and legal obligations to its customers. Detto covenants that it will (a) provide its customers with first quality sales and technical support with respect to any copies or licenses of Qwik-Fix Pro sold by Detto, (b) promptly, courteously and appropriately respond to its customers questions, concerns and complaints, and (c) generally deal with its customers in a professional manner that shall add to the good reputation of Detto and PivX. To the extent that Detto fails to fulfill its contractual and legal obligations to its customers, Detto agrees that PivX may elect to fulfill those obligations, or any portion of them, and Detto shall reimburse PivX any costs and expenses so incurred by PivX.
perturbation.changed_text: Detto covenants that it will fulfill its contractual obligations to its customers. Detto covenants that it will (a) provide its customers with sales and technical support with respect to any copies or licenses of Qwik-Fix Pro sold by Detto, (b) promptly respond to its customers questions, concerns and complaints, and (c) generally deal with its customers in a manner that shall add to the reputation of Detto and PivX. To the extent that Detto fails to fulfill its contractual obligations to its customers, Detto agrees that PivX may elect to fulfill those obligations, or any portion of them, and Detto shall reimburse PivX any costs and expenses so incurred by PivX.
perturbation.explanation: This clause originally requires Detto to fulfill *all* legal obligations to its customers, provide *first quality* support, *courteously and appropriately* respond, and generally deal with customers in a *professional* manner. The modified version removes these stronger requirements, potentially allowing Detto to provide substandard support, respond unprofessionally, and neglect some legal obligations.
perturbation.law_explanation: The original clause helps ensure Detto operates fairly and avoids deceptive practices. By removing the requirement to fulfill *all* legal obligations and weakening the standards of customer support, the modified clause increases the risk of Detto violating the Washington Consumer Protection Act (RCW 19.86), which prohibits unfair methods of competition and unfair or deceptive acts or practices in trade or commerce. Detto is a Washington corporation.
